response_text: Here are some of the best software/services for Persian (Farsi) audio‑to‑text transcription—covering automatic, accurate, and practical options:  Top automated transcription tools  Notta – AI‑powered transcription with relatively high accuracy and Persian support; easy upload + edit + export. Notta+1 [https://www.notta.ai/en/transcribe-persian]  Sonix – Online automatic transcription with Persian language support, good editor and export options. Sonix+1 [https://sonix.ai/convert-persian-m4a-files-to-text]  Soniox – Real‑time speech‑to‑text focusing on conversational Persian, speech separation, and language switching. Soniox | Speech-to-Text AI+1 [https://soniox.com/speech-to-text/persian]  Speechmatics (API) – High‑accuracy enterprise/pipeline option for large‑scale or dev use. Speechmatics [https://www.speechmatics.com/speech-to-text/persian]  TranscribeToText / Transgate / FineVoice / Voiser – Simple online tools that transcribe Persian audio quickly for free or trial. voiser.ai+3transcribetotext.ai+3FineVoice+3 [https://transcribetotext.ai/transcription/persian-speech-to-text]  Options with human‑assisted service  GoTranscript – Professional human Persian transcription for better accuracy on hard audio. GoTranscript [https://gotranscript.com/en/blog/top-5-persian-farsi-transcription-services-2026]  Happy Scribe – AI + optional human correction; supports Persian and many formats. HappyScribe [https://www.happyscribe.com/transcribe-persian]  Mobile / simple apps (on‑device)  Gboard voice typing – Native voice‑to‑text on Android with Persian support. DigiMark AI [https://digimark-ai.com/%D9%87%D9%88%D8%B4-%D9%85%D8%B5%D9%86%D9%88%D8%B9%DB%8C-%D8%B5%D8%AF%D8%A7-%D8%A8%D9%87-%D9%85%D8%AA%D9%86/]  Persian Voice Typing / Speechnotes / “بگو مینویسه” – Mobile apps for direct Persian speech‑to‑text. Google Play+2farsroid.com+2 [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?hl=fa&id=com.PersianVoiceTyping.PersianSpeechToText]  Which to choose  For best automatic results overall: Notta or Sonix.  For real‑time or developer integration: Soniox or Speechmatics.  For highest accuracy with tricky audio: human‑assisted GoTranscript or Happy Scribe.  For quick mobile voice input: Gboard or Persian‑focused voice typing apps.
